items.title: My Only Resolution
items.content_html:
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
items.content_text:
I don’t usually do New Year’s resolutions. This year I’m trying one: I’m going to try to follow Dan Sinker’s guide on daily journaling (https://dansinker.com/posts/reflections/).

I struggle with task management at work, and with keeping track of what I’ve done throughout the year. My hope is that this process will help with both of those things.
